content.rendered:
Dong is grown in the Northern provinces, especially in mountainous and midland provinces. Dong Leaves are used to pack Chung cake or Tet cake … (Similar to frozen banana leaves)

Production of Frozen dong leaves

After harvest, the good leaves are retained. bad parts will be cut off, petioles are cut short.

Dong Leaves will be washed several times with clean water, drained and cleaned with a clean towel.

Dong Leaves are washed

The leaves are rolled up and packed into a carton

The leaves are packed into plastic bag.

excerpt.rendered: Dong is grown in the Northern provinces, especially in mountainous and midland provinces. Dong Leaves are used to pack Chung…
